template <dimension_type Dim, typename MapT, typename BlockT>
struct vsip::impl::Is_par_same_map
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Check if lhs map is same as rhs block's map.

Two blocks are the same if they distribute a view into subblocks containing the same elements.

Specializations:
Is_par_same_map<D,M,const expr::Unary>
Is_par_same_map<D,M,const expr::Binary>
Is_par_same_map<D,M,const expr::Ternary>
Is_par_same_map<MapDim,MapT,expr::Scalar>
Is_par_same_map<MapDim,MapT,const expr::Vmmul>
